00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_PUT_COMPOSE_FORWARD_SEQ_ARG_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_PUT_COMPOSE_FORWARD_SEQ_ARG_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <algorithm>
00013 #include <boost/range/begin.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/range/end.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/assign/v2/put/compose/csv/held.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/framework.hpp>
00017 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/copy.hpp>
00018 
00019 namespace boost{
00020 namespace assign{
00021 namespace v2{
00022 namespace put_compose_csv_aux{
00023 
00024         template<typename O>
00025         class arg_forwarder : ref::wrapper<ref::assign_tag::copy, O const>
00026     {
00027         typedef ref::assign_tag::copy assign_tag_;
00028         typedef ref::wrapper<assign_tag_, O const> super_t;
00029 
00030         public:
00031         
00032         arg_forwarder(){}
00033         arg_forwarder(O const& object)
00034                 :super_t( object ){}
00035         
00036         template<typename T>
00037         void operator()(T& t)const
00038         {
00039                 this->unwrap()( t );
00040         }
00041         template<typename T>
00042         void operator()(T const& t)const
00043         {
00044                 this->unwrap()( t );
00045         }
00046 
00047     };
00048 
00049         template<typename O, typename Pars, std::size_t N, typename U>
00050         void forward_seq_arg(O const& object, held<Pars, N, U> const& h)
00051     {
00052         typedef arg_forwarder<O> forwarder_;
00053         forwarder_ f( object );
00054                 std::for_each(
00055                 boost::begin( h.sequence_arg() ),
00056             boost::end( h.sequence_arg() ),
00057             f
00058         );
00059                 
00060     }
00061  
00062 }// put_compose_csv_aux
00063 }// v2
00064 }// assign
00065 }// boost
00066 
00067 #endif
